title: 66th birth anniversary of Mangala
body_lines: A program was held to mark the 66th birth anniversary of former minister Mangala Samaraweera at Viharamahadevi Park yesterday. Leaders of political parties including Former President Chandrika Kumaratunga, Leader of Opposition Sajith Premadasa and Former Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe were present at the event. Pix by Pradeep Dilrukshana
